complet team history, see histori chicago bears. complet list team awards, see list chicago bear award winners. chicago bear franchis origin found decatur staleys, charter member american profession footbal associ (apfa). team move chicago, illinoi 1921 chang name bear 1922, year apfa chang name nation footbal leagu (nfl).[1][2] list document franchise' complet season 1920 present, includ postseason record result postseason games.[3] chicago bear play one thousand game history, includ eight nfl championship victori one super bowl win. bears' nine championship second team history. franchis captur 18 nfl division titl four nfl confer championships. bear also record regular season overal victori nfl franchise.[4][5][6] franchis experienc three major period continu success history. first period success came 1932 1946 bear play nine nfl championship games, win six them. period saw bear particip first ever nation footbal leagu playoff game, first ever offici nfl championship game, becom american footbal sport dynasti 1940s. bear play four straight nfl championship game 1940 1944, win three them, includ nfl record 73–0 victori washington redskin 1940.[7][8] second period success 1984 1991 bear captur six nfc central divis titl eight year super bowl xx.[9][10] brief period success stretch 2005 2007 franchis captur two straight nfc north titl nfc championship title, earn berth super bowl xli, game club lost indianapoli colts.[11] bear experienc failur history. franchis finish last place within divis five time 1970s.[12] 1970, team move wrigley field soldier field play home games. mid- late 1990 earli 2000s, club post six season 10 losses. chance, two decades—th 1970 1990s—are decad bear histori franchis play nfl championship super bowl. 1969 season, franchis post worst regular season record 1–13 showing.[13] content 1 legend 2 season record 3 footnot 4 refer 5 extern link legend[edit] soldier field, current home chicago bear (#) order leagu championship franchis finish final posit league, division, confer w win l lose tie win% win percentag t-# finish tie posit one team nfl champion (1920–1969) super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth one-gam playoff berth season records[edit] season team leagu confer divis regular season post season result award ref. finish win loss tie win% decatur staley 1920 1920 apfa 2nd 10 1 2 .846 apfa hold playoff game [4][a] chicago staley 1921 1921 apfa 1st 9 1 1 .864 name apfa champion [4][b] chicago bear 1922 1922 nfl 2nd 9 3 0 .750 nfl hold playoff game 1932 [4] 1923 1923 nfl 2nd 9 2 1 .792 [4] 1924 1924 nfl 2nd 6 1 4 .727 [4] 1925 1925 nfl 7th 9 5 3 .618 [4] 1926 1926 nfl 2nd 12 1 3 .844 [4] 1927 1927 nfl 3rd 9 3 2 .714 [4] 1928 western 1st 10 2 1 .808 nfl championship (3) (giants) 23–21 [4][d] 1934 1934 nfl western 1st 13 0 0 1.000 lost nfl championship (giants) 30–13 [4][e] 1935 1935 nfl western t-3rd 6 4 2 .583 [4] 1936 1936 nfl western 2nd 9 3 0 .750 [4] 1937 1937 nfl western 1st 9 1 1 .864 lost nfl championship (redskins) 28–21 [4] 1938 1938 nfl western 3rd 6 5 0 .545 [4] 1939 1939 nfl western 2nd 8 3 0 .727 [4] 1940 1940 nfl western 1st 8 3 0 .727 nfl championship (4) (redskins) 73–0 [4][f] 1941 1941 nfl western 1st 10 1 0 .909 western division playoff (packers) 33–14 nfl championship (5) (giants) 37–9 [4][g] 1942 1942 nfl western 1st 11 0 0 1.000 lost nfl championship (redskins) 14–6 [4][e] 1943 1943 nfl western 1st 8 1 1 .850 nfl championship (6) (redskins) 41–21 sid luckman (mvp) [4] 1944 1944 nfl western t-2nd 6 3 1 .650 [4] 1945 1945 nfl western 4th 3 7 0 .300 [4] 1946 1946 nfl western 1st 8 2 1 .773 nfl championship (7) (giants) 24–14 [4] 1947 1947 nfl western 2nd 8 4 0 .667 [4] 1948 1948 nfl western 2nd 10 2 0 .833 [4] 1949 1949 nfl western 2nd 9 3 0 .750 [4] 1950 1950 nfl nation t-1st 9 3 0 .750 lost confer playoff (rams) 24–14 [4][h] 1951 1951 nfl nation 4th 7 5 0 .583 [4] 1952 1952 nfl nation 5th 5 7 0 .417 [4] 1953 1953 nfl western 4th 3 8 1 .292 [4] 1954 1954 nfl western 2nd 8 4 0 .667 [4] 1955 1955 nfl western 2nd 8 4 0 .667 [4] 1956 1956 nfl western 1st 9 2 1 .792 lost (1920–2015)[47][q] 9 nfl championships, 4 confer championships, 18 division championship footnotes[edit] offici stand maintain 1920 season, championship award akron pro leagu meet april 30, 1921. club play schedul includ game nonleagu opponents. b nfl hold playoff game 1932. team finish best regular season record name leagu champions. c result 1932 nfl playoff game determin nfl champion bear portsmouth spartans. game count stand broke tie. score playoff game parenthesi win score first matter outcom bears. e bear deni perfect season two accounts. first one 1934 13–0 club lost new york giant championship game. second occurr happen 1942 11–0 club deni perfect "three-peat" washington redskins. f bear victori redskin 1940 nfl championship nfl record greatest margin victori point score game. h bear tie ram 1st place end season, lost one-gam playoff tiebreak therefor win confer championship. 1967 nfl season mark first season league' histori leagu divid two confer subdivid two divisions. 1967, leagu either divid two divisions, two conferences, neither. j result afl-nfl merger, leagu broken two conferences, afl team move american footbal conference. k 2010 nfl season, season mark last tie game bear played. game soldier field septemb 24, 1972 lo angel rams. game end 13–13. l 1982 season strike-shorten season leagu divid two confer instead normal division alignment. franchise' first super bowl victori ninth leagu championship. n strike 1987 reduc regular season schedul 16 15 games. division playoff game eagl known fog bowl due heavi fog cover field game. p 2010
